title: Charming italics?
content:
I don't know if u people hate this "listing type" of questions, but this is for those who have time :)

I'm searching for fonts with (I don't know how to exactly say) charming, softy, "approachable" italics and especially bold italics. For sans and serifs separately. Maybe I better quote examples.

For sans something like beautiful Serrano or TodayS...  
For serifs like Dolly, Fedra serif (not so softy but memorable)...

Fire at will :)  
Thnx!
author: owb

comments.content:
Maybe I am just a total die-hard sucker for ff Meta, but its really one of the only typefaces that I absolutely love for sans italics.
